summary: A reference script that trains and evaluates a GraphSAGE model on the OGBN‑Products node property prediction dataset using DGL and PyTorch, handling data loading, subgraph sampling, model definition, training loop, and accuracy measurement.
business_intent: Showcase how to build and benchmark a scalable graph neural network for product‑related node classification tasks, aiding researchers and engineers in developing recommendation or categorization systems on large graph data.
